fileList.title: Document List
fileList.empty: No documents, click "Pull New Files" to get

editor.selectFile: Select a document to start editing
editor.createNew: or click "New Document" to create a new file
editor.placeholder: Type # to create heading, type ``` to create code block, or start typing markdown...

dialog.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete file "{name}"?
dialog.deleteLocalOnly:
Select "Confirm" to delete local file
Select "Cancel" to perform no action
dialog.deleteRemoteMessage:
Also delete remote file?

Select "Confirm" to delete both remote and local files
Select "Cancel" to delete only local file

toast.fileCreated: File "{name}" created successfully and saved locally

config.title: GitHub Configuration
config.tokenHint: Create in GitHub Settings ‚Üí Developer settings ‚Üí Personal access tokens
config.configComplete: ‚úÖ Configuration complete! You can now enter the editor
config.step1: Fill in your GitHub repository information
config.step2: Create Personal Access Token (requires repo permissions)
config.step3: Save configuration to database (auto-saved, no need to reconfigure)
config.step4: Manually pull and commit documents in the editor
config.pleaseCompleteAllFields: Please fill in all required fields

errors.fileModified: File has been modified by other operations, please pull the latest version first
errors.getLocalFileCountFailed: Failed to get local file count
errors.noFileSHA: Unable to get file SHA value, please pull the latest version first
errors.remoteFileModified: Remote file has been modified, please pull the latest version before deleting
errors.authFailed: Authentication failed, please check if GitHub Token is valid
errors.missingRequiredField: Missing required parameters, please pull file first to get latest SHA value
errors.requestParameterError: Request parameter error, please check file path
errors.fileNameExists: File name "{name}" already exists, please use a different name

messages.bothFilesDeleted: Both remote and local files deleted

prompts.enterTokenMessage: Please enter GitHub Token to complete configuration
prompts.selectFilesMessage:
Found {count} files, please enter the file names to pull (separated by commas):

{fileList}
prompts.remoteContentMessage:
Remote file content is {diff} characters longer than local file.

Remote content contains the following differences:
{changes}

Select "Confirm" to overwrite remote file, select "Cancel" to cancel commit.
prompts.contentDiffMessage:
Local file content differs from remote file.

Difference overview:
{diff}

Select "Confirm" to overwrite local file, select "Cancel" to keep local version.
prompts.deleteRemoteFailedMessage:
Failed to delete remote file ({error})

Please manually delete the remote file:
1. Visit: {url}
2. Click delete button
3. Commit the deletion

After deletion, click "Confirm" to continue deleting local file, or click "Cancel" to cancel operation.

ui.emptyFileList: No documents, click "Pull New Files" to get
